item.title: 在Linux(Centos/Ubuntu)上，安裝LAMP/LEMP(LNMP)
item.description: PHP Centos 從官網取得 Remi和 EPEL rpm的連結 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 centos 7: $sudo rpm -Uvh https://rpms.remirepo.net/enterprise/remi-release-7.rpm; $sudo rpm -Uvh https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm; centos 8: $sudo rpm -Uvh https://rpms.remirepo.net/enterprise/remi-release-8.rpm; $sudo rpm -Uvh https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-8.noarch.rpm; 安装 yum-utils工具，並設定 php套件
